Text: Hi and thank you for this torrent. Would you or anyone else know how to shrink the songs to fit on a cd? I know that cds are becoming obsolete and I'm outdated with everyone using ipods and stuff but I'd really like to include ALL 21 songs on a disc. Any tips would be appreciated. Thanks.

@george1052

re-rip it with 192 or 128 bitrate
hit google for programs
1 of them called "format factory" TRY IT
I'm not sure if changing the bitrate will allow you to burn them all on one disc, I wasn't able to get them all to fit. Sorry.
thanks!!! very nice quality and very fast downoad!
